name: Rites Of Banishment
description:
You are the Alfenheim's women only hope! All men have vanished protecting the villages from raiders, so your magical talent is the only thing standing between defensless villagers and mysterious black knights and their leader. You must use your powers wisely....

Talk with women of Alfenheim, complete a series of tasks commissioned by them and help these troubled lands be peaceful again.

Controls:

Mouse cursor - aiming & navigation

LBM - Movement - point & click / hold 

RMB - base offensive spell

ESC - in-game menu

Q, W, E - advanced spells

T - interaction (NPCs & mine entrances)

L - open quest log

Controls can be viewed and adjusted in "Settings" submenu.

Known issues: 

  • Visual bug on the south level - transparent material (visible in hub village when entering buildings) not loading correctly - does not impact gameplay.
  • Visual bug - healthbars can display incorrect amount of enemy health
  • GUI bug - quests' descrptions may not fit properly in the quest window (dependent on native screen resolution)
  • Gameplay bug - quest objectives not updating in quest log (ad-hoc solution - exit and reenter location again)

Turning the game off and on again might resolve the issue. 

Downloading "Rites of Banishment Day Zero Patch.zip" is highly recomended - in this version visual bugs mentioned above have been fixed
